name: Elves Fantasy Hentai Puzzle
description:
On Elves Fantasy Hentai Puzzle, you have to complete each girl’s picture by relocating, rotating, or swapping different tiles.
Explore the small endearing castle full of paintings of beautiful elves, and enjoy the tranquility of the 3D map before taking on a new puzzle.
The game offers a “random mode” that unlocks once you complete all puzzles.
Features:
Image matching puzzle gameplay
Beautiful art
26 levels + 2 random modes
Image gallery
Streamer mode
